description: A shady thief lurks in a dark corner
outcome_positive: eyeing you suspiciously. He steps forward and says
outcome_negative: "I can take whatever I want from you
reward_type: but I'll be nice. Hand over some of your money
reward_amount: or I'll make you regret it."

description: A stern-looking police officer stands nearby
outcome_positive: watching the crowd. He locks eyes with you and says
reward_type: or I'll have to deal with you." He observes you carefully.
reward_amount: The cop gives you a friendly nod and some useful advice.
penalty_type: He fines you for bribery and walks away with a disappointed look.

description: An old man sits on the ground
outcome_positive: begging for help. "I’ve been stuck here for years
reward_type: give me 10 coins so I can buy a ticket home. I just want to go back to my family." His eyes are filled with desperation.
penalty_type: and he thanks you with tears in his eyes. He says

description: A local woman stands by the side of the road. She looks hungry and tired. "I haven’t eaten all day
outcome_positive: she says softly. Could you buy me a meal? I’ll even repay you in some way
outcome_negative: she adds hopefully.,You offer her a meal, and she hands you a health pack, saying, This should help you." You feel a sense of warmth for helping her.
reward_amount: but you lose 15 coins. She gives you a health pack
penalty_type: but you can't help feeling like you've given more than expected.

description: You come across a pile of trash in an alley. You hesitate but then decide to check it out. As you dig through the garbage
outcome_positive: you find either some loose change or something dangerous.
reward_type: a small blessing from the trash.
reward_amount: You cut your hand on a broken bottle and feel a sharp pain. You start feeling ill from the injury.

outcome_positive: run-down store stands in front of you. The owner greets you and says
outcome_negative: "I’ve got health packs for sale. I can help you out for just 5 coins. They’ll get you back on your feet!"
reward_type: You buy a health pack for 5 coins and feel better as your health improves.
reward_amount: You walk away with no purchase, but the storekeeper seems unfazed.
